name: gen21
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wvd2(w0, w1, wal(s0, w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wal(s0, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wvd2(w0, w1, wal(s0, w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wal(s0, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wal(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wvd2(w0, w1, wal(s0, w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

|- wvd2(w0, w1, wal(s0, w2))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)
-| wvd2(w0, w1, w2)

comment: Virtual deduction generalizing rule for one quantifying variables and two virtual hypothesis. ~ gen21 is ~ alrimdv with virtual deductions. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 25-Jul-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
